page.title: 06The Latchley Box Factory
page.content: The present manager has been in charge of the{box factory}at Latchley for ten years.This factory has been in existence for{thirteen {years.}There are only{three employees on the premises. The box factory makes all sorts of items, such as{coasters and{table mats}as well as{egg {cartons}and{packaging}for various goods. They use{cardboard}to make their boxes. Their supply of cartons and items extends as far as Penzance, and the{delivery of these goods}is {made by van.}Thousands of boxes are made in just one week.The supply of boxes increases as is necessary, in the harvest time. A drop in the number of market gardeners does affect the demand for boxes locally.
